sentences.en: "Giles phoned this morning," Mirella said with feigned indifference.
sentences.cn: “贾尔斯今早来电话了，”米雷拉装作若无其事地说。

sentences.en: Constable's landscapes met with indifference when they were first exhibited.
sentences.cn: 康斯特布尔的风景画在首次展出时受到了冷遇.

sentences.en: He displayed a sublime indifference to the distinction between right and wrong.
sentences.cn: 他对是非之间的差别根本就无动于衷。

sentences.en: He feigned indifference to criticism of his work.
sentences.cn: 他假装毫不在意别人批评他的作品.

sentences.en: He laughed it off with aristocratic indifference.
sentences.cn: 他带着贵族式的漠然对其一笑置之。

sentences.en: He made an affectation of indifference.
sentences.cn: 他装出无动于衷的样子.

sentences.en: He treated my request with indifference.
sentences.cn: 他对我的请求不予重视.

sentences.en: He treats the pain with indifference.
sentences.cn: 他对这种痛苦漠不关心.

sentences.en: Her recent indifference to her work is all of a piece with her troubled mental state.
sentences.cn: 她最近对工作冷淡与她那不安的心境有关.

sentences.en: his total indifference to what people thought of him
sentences.cn: 他对别人怎么看他毫不在乎的态度

sentences.en: I was disappointed by his indifference more than somewhat.
sentences.cn: 他的漠不关心使我很失望.

sentences.en: Its clear atmosphere, more populous thoroughfares, and peculiar indifference struck her forcibly.
sentences.cn: 这里的空气清新, 街道更加宽阔, 还有人们之间那特有的互不关心,这一切都给她留下了深刻的印象.

sentences.en: She felt his indifference keenly and longed to see Hurstwood.
sentences.cn: 她深切感到他对她不关心,因此渴望见到赫斯渥.

sentences.en: This indifference must be broken up at any cost.
sentences.cn: 她要不惜一切代价治好他的麻木不仁.

sentences.en: Whether you stay or leave is a matter of total indifference to me (= I do not care ).
sentences.cn: 你是留是走我根本无所谓。

words.tran_cn: 漠不关心的；无关紧要的；中性的，中立的
